operations.content:
version: 1
name: goal_1770723806
description: Stabilize scenario goals/goal_1770723806.yaml
targets:
  - route: /api/v1/stabilize
    method: POST
    parameters:
      - name: experience_id
        type: integer
        required: true
      - name: exp_hash
        type: string
        required: true
    responses:
      - status_code: 200
        description: Success
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/definitions/StabilizeResponse'
definitions:
  StabilizeResponse:
    type: object
    properties:
      message:
        type: string
      status:
        type: string
